summary: The writer is invited to the town of Tashlinsk by the mutants who emerged after an unnatural and constant rain causing the evacuation of the city, and by the children who are studying the unearthly knowledge of mutants.
cast: Gregory Hlady|Leonid Mozgovoy|Aleksey Kortnev|Rimma Sarkisyan|Laura Pitskhelauri|Sergey Barkovskiy|Dmitriy Ispolatov|Olga Samoshina|Aleksey Ingelevich|Viktor Mikhaylov|Viktor Dzekanovskiy|Vladimir Grigorev|Vasiliy Petrov|Ilya Kovalev|Anastasiya Rudenko|Evgeniy Kalchenko|Yuriy Bibisi|Anastasiya Falileeva|Nikita Skvirskiy|Aleksandr Khodot|Anna Lazurenko|Boris Birman|Sergey Russkin|Boris Voytsekhovskiy|Roman Makarenko|Aleksandr Dyuris|Dmitriy Mokeev|Vladimir Maryanov|Pavel Yakovlev|Igor Sergeev|Dmitriy Brodskiy|Boris Schwarzmann|Igor Naftulev|Manana Gogitidze|Yuriy Orlov|Oleg Ogiy|Irina Korovina|Svetlana Nemirovskaya|Boris Gurevich|Andrey Sigle|Jacques Martell|Scott Tobin|Vasiliy Mikhaylov|Egor Evstafev|Mariya Myasnikova|Sergey Lysov|Andrey Losev|Fyodor Selkin|Andrey Shimko|Aleksey Ispolatov|Vadim Boganov|Leonid Nitsenko|Yuriy Zaytsev|Dmitriy Yagnov|Irina Osnovina|Tatyana Polonskaya|Tatyana Mishina|Lyudmila Samsonova|Sergey Kudryavtsev|Konstantin Anisimov|Vadim Malyshev|Dmitriy Ezhov|Yuriy Kalugin|Aleksandr Tsybulskiy|Aleksandr Pestov|Tatyana Malyshchitskaya|Evgeniy Bulgakov|Nikolay Karapetyan|Dmitriy Gerbachevskiy|Aleksandr Vasilyev|Sergey Ramzaev|Natalya Mokshina|Anna Arapova
title: Gadkie lebedi
